mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice_test (NOTICE_PK, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_HITS, NOTICE_TIME, NOTICE_HIGHLIGHTED, COMMON_CODE_PK, ATTACHED_PK, USER_PK) VALUES (notice_pk_seq.nextval, #{NOTICE_TITLE}, #{NOTICE_CONTENT}, 0, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{NOTICE_HIGHLIGHTED, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{COMMON_CODE_PK, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ATTACHED_PK}, #{USER_PK})
